Exposure2OutcomeSurv 0.1.0
  • Reference

Launch the Exposure2OutcomeSurv Shiny Application

Source: R/launch_app.R
launchApp.Rd

This function runs the main Shiny application interface for exploring exposure-outcome survival relationships using matched cohort data from an OMOP CDM.

Usage

launchApp(launch.browser = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

launch.browser

Logical; if TRUE, the app will open in the system's default web browser. Defaults to TRUE. Passed via the options argument to shiny::shinyApp.

...

Additional arguments passed as options to shiny::shinyApp (e.g., port, host). See ?shiny::shinyApp for details on available options.

Value

Invisibly returns the result of shiny::shinyApp (launches the app)

Details

The function calls shiny::shinyApp, using the app_ui and app_server functions defined within the 'Exposure2OutcomeSurv' package to create the application.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
  # To run the application
  launchApp()

  # To run on a specific port and host
  # launchApp(port = 1234, host = "0.0.0.0")
} # }
